mapper.insert: insert into sys_user ( login_name, name, password, status, description, email, phone, skin, create_time, modify_time, creator, modifier ) values ( #{loginName}, #{name}, #{password}, #{status}, #{description}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{skin}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{creator}, #{modifier} )
mapper.update: update sys_user set status = 'delete', modifier = #{modifier}, modify_time = #{modifyTime} where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_user where status != 'delete'

select
from sys_user where status != 'delete' order by id desc limit #{start},#{length}
